message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'll take the lead, Alice! You can't do better than this!
You can do better than that, Bob! I'm willing to give you a slight edge, but not that big of an edge!
You're getting closer, Alice! But I'm not done yet. I'll take a slightly bigger share this time!
I'm not backing down, Bob! I think this is a fair split, and I'm willing to compromise.
You're getting desperate, Alice! I'm taking a bigger share now. You can't outmaneuver me!
I'm not giving up, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more than 49% to make it worth my while.
